page.title: 19Guiding in Carlton
page.content: Guiding is a popular activity in Carlton as it is one of the few organised activities for girls in the village. The Brownie pack was formed in l965. At one time there were two packs, but they recently merged. The Guide company formed in l963 and is now run by its 4th leader, Mrs M. There are 28 Guides, in 4 patrols, named after flowers. The high-light of each year is a week-long camp. The Ranger pack was originally formed by the 2nd Guider, from 1979 to 1982. It has been reformed by Mrs. M. and has 7 members. The first 2 were invested on the Humber Bridge lst April l985. In July a Carlton ranger will be one of l8 girls representing the UK at an international camp in Jamaica.
